channel.title: Stoner Simon
channel.description: Stoner Simon - Sharing stoner along the web

item.title: Skraeckoedlan - Haven
item.description:
Posted on November 26, 2013 by Simon
Tagged: Stoner, Psychedelic, Sweden, heavy

Well, Sweden seems like the new heaven of stoner. ANother awesome band, sounding very Truckfighter-esque (and I love these guys) with a more obvious psychedelic side. Awesome !

item.title: Monster Magnet - End Of Time
item.description:
Posted on November 26, 2013 by Simon
Tagged: Stoner, Classic, USA, New Album

I’m usually not a big fan of Monster Magnet (yeah I know, shame on me), but I tried this new album anyway, cause they are very different from one album to another. And this song just blew me away ! Thoses solis are incredible ! Nice one, Monter Magnet, nice one …

item.title: Dozer - Lightyears Ahead
item.description:
Posted on November 25, 2013 by Simon
Tagged: Stoner, Sweden, Underrated, Heavy

Another Swedish stoner band. They have been around since 2000 and it’s a shame that almost nobody knows them. An excellent band indeed !

item.title: Lizzard Wizzard - Bong Dive
item.description:
Posted on November 15, 2013 by Simon
Tagged: Stoner, Doom, Australia, Fun

This aussie stoner/doom band got some groovy riffs, and the best lyrics EVER !

Come with me
Ten thousand leagues
Under the T.H.Sea

Fuck your swim coach
And fucking choke
On this gnarly roach

Snags and swimming trunks
Don’t come unless
You’re high or fucking drunk

Don’t forget your towel

Bad play on word and H2G2 references ? Yes sir !
Also, check out their cover of the Game Of Thrones theme !

item.title: Sierra - Smoke Filled Room
item.description:
Posted on November 14, 2013 by Simon
Tagged: Stoner, Progressive, Canada

Canadian progressive stoner. There isn’t enough progressive stoner. Really nice tune.

item.title: Sun And Sail Club - Mannequin (full album streaming)
item.description:
Posted on November 12, 2013 by Simon
Tagged: Stoner, Vocoder, Full album, Kyuss, Fu Manchu

The side-project of Bob Balch, Scott Reeder (Fu Manchu) and Scott Thomas Reeder (ex-Kyuss) is almost out ! While waiting for November 19th, you can listen to their album on streaming here !
And I love it so far !

item.title: Monkey3 - Birth Of Venus
item.description:
Posted on November 5, 2013 by Simon
Tagged: Stoner Doom, Psychedelic, Instrumental, Switzerland

4 guys from Switzerland, playing an instrumental psychedelic stoner doom ? Yes sir !

item.title: Acrimony - Motherslug (The Mother Of All Slugs)
item.description:
Posted on November 3, 2013 by Simon
Tagged: Stoner, Doom, StonerDoom, Psychedelic, Underrated

An underrated band that should be a classic ! Acrimony plays a stoner doom heavily psychedelic. but you’ll hear yourself …

item.title: Fu Manchu - Robotic Invasion
item.description:
Posted on October 30, 2013 by Simon
Tagged: Stoner, Classic band, USA, New song

New song from the great Fu Manchu ! Enjoy.

item.title: Noctum - Liberty In Death
item.description:
Posted on October 29, 2013 by Simon
Tagged: Doom, Hard Rock, Sweden, Ghost

Not purely stoner, more on the doom side, blended with hard rock and a slight touch of psychedelic. Those guys reminds me a lot of Ghost, in less theatrical. And I ADORE Ghost.
